001package org.nasdanika.emf.persistence;
002
003import java.io.File;
004import java.net.URI;
005import java.net.URL;
006import java.nio.file.Path;
007import java.nio.file.Paths;
008import java.util.HashMap;
009import java.util.Map;
010import java.util.Map.Entry;
011
012import org.eclipse.emf.ecore.util.EcoreUtil;
013import org.eclipse.jgit.lib.Constants;
014import org.eclipse.jgit.lib.Ref;
015import org.eclipse.jgit.lib.Repository;
016import org.eclipse.jgit.lib.StoredConfig;
017import org.eclipse.jgit.storage.file.FileRepositoryBuilder;
018import org.nasdanika.common.ProgressMonitor;
019import org.nasdanika.common.Status;
020import org.nasdanika.common.Util;
021import org.nasdanika.ncore.GitMarker;
022import org.nasdanika.ncore.Marker;
023import org.nasdanika.ncore.NcoreFactory;
024
025/**
026 * Creates a git marker if location is in a git repository or a regular marker otherwise.
027 * @author Pavel
028 *
029 */
030public class GitMarkerFactory implements MarkerFactory {
031        
032        private Map<File, GitMarker> templates = new HashMap<>();
033
034        @Override
035        public Marker createMarker(String location, ProgressMonitor progressMonitor) {          
036                try {
037                        if (!Util.isBlank(location) && location.startsWith("file:/")) {
038                                URI locationURI = new URL(location).toURI();
039                                Path path = Paths.get(locationURI);
040                                File file = path.toFile().getCanonicalFile();
041                                for (Entry<File, GitMarker> re: templates.entrySet()) {
042                                        if (re.getValue() == null) {
043                                                // We already know that there is no git repo for this location
044                                                org.nasdanika.ncore.Marker marker = NcoreFactory.eINSTANCE.createMarker();
045                                                marker.setLocation(location);
046                                                return marker;
047                                        }
048                                        if (isAncestor(file, re.getKey())) {
049                                                GitMarker marker = EcoreUtil.copy(re.getValue());
050                                                URI repoWorkTreeURI = re.getKey().toURI();                                      
051                                                marker.setPath(repoWorkTreeURI.relativize(locationURI).toString());
052                                                marker.setLocation(location);
053                                                return marker;                                  
054                                        }
055                                }
056                                FileRepositoryBuilder repositoryBuilder = new FileRepositoryBuilder().readEnvironment();
057                                repositoryBuilder.findGitDir(file);
058                                if (repositoryBuilder.getGitDir() == null) {
059                                        templates.put(file.getParentFile(), null);
060                                }                               
061                                try (Repository repository = repositoryBuilder.build()) {
062                                        GitMarker template = NcoreFactory.eINSTANCE.createGitMarker();
063                                        StoredConfig config = repository.getConfig();
064                                        for (String remote: repository.getRemoteNames()) {
065                                                template.getRemotes().put(remote, config.getString("remote", "origin", "url"));
066                                        }
067                                        template.setBranch(repository.getBranch());
068                                        for (Ref ref: repository.getRefDatabase().getRefs()) {
069                                                if (ref.getName().equals(Constants.HEAD)) {
070                                                        template.setHead(ref.getObjectId().getName());
071                                                        for (Ref refTwo: repository.getRefDatabase().getRefs()) {
072                                                                if (!refTwo.getName().equals(Constants.HEAD) && refTwo.getObjectId().equals(ref.getObjectId())) {
073                                                                        template.getHeadRefs().add(refTwo.getName());
074                                                                }
075                                                        }                                                       
076                                                }
077                                        }
078                                        templates.put(repository.getWorkTree(), template);
079                                        GitMarker marker = EcoreUtil.copy(template);
080                                        URI repoWorkTreeURI = repository.getWorkTree().toURI();                                 
081                                        marker.setPath(repoWorkTreeURI.relativize(locationURI).toString());
082                                        marker.setLocation(location);
083                                        return marker;                                  
084                                }
085                        }
086                } catch (Exception e) {
087                        progressMonitor.worked(Status.ERROR, 1, "Error creating a file from location '" + location +"': " + e, e);
088                }
089                org.nasdanika.ncore.Marker marker = NcoreFactory.eINSTANCE.createMarker();
090                marker.setLocation(location);
091                return marker;  
092        }
093        
094        private boolean isAncestor(File file, File ancestor) {
095                File parent = file.getParentFile();
096                if (parent == null) {
097                        return false;
098                }
099                if (parent.equals(ancestor)) {
100                        return true;
101                }
102                return isAncestor(parent, ancestor);
103        }
104
105}
